TEXT.English: Please support [OUR_CIV_SHORT] and it's people. We depend on your help!
TEXT.Chinese: Please support [OUR_CIV_SHORT] and it's people. We depend on your help!

TEXT.English: This will be of mutual benefit for us both, don't you think so?
TEXT.Chinese: This will be of mutual benefit for us both, don't you think so?

TEXT.English: Hail and well met, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME], ruler of the glorious [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. So tell me: does [CT_CIV_SHORT] have a lot of rich and unprotected coastal cities, or what?
TEXT.Chinese: Hail and well met, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME], ruler of the glorious [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. So tell me: does [CT_CIV_SHORT] have a lot of rich and unprotected coastal cities, or what?

TEXT.English: Mighty [OUR_NAME], all-powerful god-king of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] welcomes you, [CT_NAME]! Feel free to grovel in terror and awe if the mood takes you.
TEXT.Chinese: Mighty [OUR_NAME], all-powerful god-king of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] welcomes you, [CT_NAME]! Feel free to grovel in terror and awe if the mood takes you.

TEXT.English: Our armies are evenly matched, but I believe in a battle I would win out. So that this does not occur I ask you to meet our demands.
TEXT.Chinese: Our armies are evenly matched, but I believe in a battle I would win out. So that this does not occur I ask you to meet our demands.

TEXT.English: [OUR_CIV_SHORT] needs this and demands your assistance!
TEXT.Chinese: [OUR_CIV_SHORT] needs this and demands your assistance!

TEXT.English: Brazil is strong in many ways, [CT_NAME]. Do not force me to show you how strong.
TEXT.Chinese: Brazil is strong in many ways, [CT_NAME]. Do not force me to show you how strong.

TEXT.English: You are outgunned and outclassed. I suggest you give me what I demand.
TEXT.Chinese: You are outgunned and outclassed. I suggest you give me what I demand.

TEXT.English: Can you spare this for the people of the [OUR_EMPIRE]?
TEXT.Chinese: Can you spare this for the people of the [OUR_EMPIRE]?

TEXT.English: My people have faith in me, [CT_NAME]. Please help me not to disappoint them.
TEXT.Chinese: My people have faith in me, [CT_NAME]. Please help me not to disappoint them.

TEXT.English: The simplest strategy is for me to ask you for what we need and hope your good will wins out.
TEXT.Chinese: The simplest strategy is for me to ask you for what we need and hope your good will wins out.

TEXT.English: Greetings, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME], leader of the great civilization of [OUR_CIV_SHORT].
TEXT.Chinese: Greetings, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME], leader of the great civilization of [OUR_CIV_SHORT].

TEXT.English: Peace be upon you, [CT_NAME] of [CT_CIV_SHORT]. If you would expect the blessings of Allah, be kind to his people, for Allah will help him who moves the ways of Allah.
TEXT.Chinese: Peace be upon you, [CT_NAME] of [CT_CIV_SHORT]. If you would expect the blessings of Allah, be kind to his people, for Allah will help him who moves the ways of Allah.

TEXT.English: I am [OUR_NAME], the President of the Turkish people. We Turks do not consider our principles as dogmas contained in books that are said to come from heaven. We derive our inspiration not from heaven, or from an unseen world, but directly from life.
TEXT.Chinese: I am [OUR_NAME], the President of the Turkish people. We Turks do not consider our principles as dogmas contained in books that are said to come from heaven. We derive our inspiration not from heaven, or from an unseen world, but directly from life.

TEXT.English: Hola. I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I am convinced that the good intentions of a ruler are simply not enough and that the collective factor represented by the workers is indispensable. Don't you agree [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Chinese: Hola. I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I am convinced that the good intentions of a ruler are simply not enough and that the collective factor represented by the workers is indispensable. Don't you agree [CT_NAME]?

TEXT.English: Welcome [CT_NAME]. We would welcome friendship with you. Are you greedy of territory, or greedy of piece and quiet?
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome [CT_NAME]. We would welcome friendship with you. Are you greedy of territory, or greedy of piece and quiet?

TEXT.English: Greetings in the name of God, [CT_NAME] of [CT_CIV_SHORT]. We are Emperor [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. We know that material and spiritual progress are essential to man. Will you join us as we ceaselessly work for the equal attainment of both?
TEXT.Chinese: Greetings in the name of God, [CT_NAME] of [CT_CIV_SHORT]. We are Emperor [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. We know that material and spiritual progress are essential to man. Will you join us as we ceaselessly work for the equal attainment of both?

TEXT.English: Greetings, [CT_NAME]. My name is [OUR_NAME], and I am the president of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. My motto is: when there is respect, there is peace!
TEXT.Chinese: Greetings, [CT_NAME]. My name is [OUR_NAME], and I am the president of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. My motto is: when there is respect, there is peace!

TEXT.English: I, [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV], greet you. Know that those who speak of nationalism, democracy, and such things want to take our nation away from its mission.
TEXT.Chinese: I, [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV], greet you. Know that those who speak of nationalism, democracy, and such things want to take our nation away from its mission.

TEXT.English: Greetings. I am [OUR_NAME], Emperor of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. Dedicating all my efforts to the well-being of my people, I shall guard the concept of Autocracy like all my forefathers did.
TEXT.Chinese: Greetings. I am [OUR_NAME], Emperor of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. Dedicating all my efforts to the well-being of my people, I shall guard the concept of Autocracy like all my forefathers did.

TEXT.English: Welcome to humble [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. I am [OUR_NAME], leader of this far-reaching and ever progressing country. Tell me, who are you?
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome to humble [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. I am [OUR_NAME], leader of this far-reaching and ever progressing country. Tell me, who are you?

TEXT.English: Hello, friend. My name is [OUR_NAME], but you can call me Jose. Or you can call me Francisco. Or you can call me Martin. Just don't call me late for dinner.
TEXT.Chinese: Hello, friend. My name is [OUR_NAME], but you can call me Jose. Or you can call me Francisco. Or you can call me Martin. Just don't call me late for dinner.

TEXT.English: Hello, [CT_NAME]. I am General Santa Anna, Savior of Mexico! What have you come to offer me in tribute?
TEXT.Chinese: Hello, [CT_NAME]. I am General Santa Anna, Savior of Mexico! What have you come to offer me in tribute?

TEXT.English: Greetings [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], emperor of all the lands below the heavens. With absolute power over numberless minions, do you dare hurt the divine ruler of mighty [OUR_CIV_SHORT].
TEXT.Chinese: Greetings [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], emperor of all the lands below the heavens. With absolute power over numberless minions, do you dare hurt the divine ruler of mighty [OUR_CIV_SHORT].

TEXT.English: [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] greets you. I do not praise myself or my courage, but I praise God, for he protected me, a sinful man, from deadly dangers and created me capable of doing many human things.
TEXT.Chinese: [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] greets you. I do not praise myself or my courage, but I praise God, for he protected me, a sinful man, from deadly dangers and created me capable of doing many human things.

TEXT.English: We must get ready to build up the friendship between our peoples. How does a people get prepared for such an endeavour? By strengthening the natural bridges that exist between us. Language is a bridge... Religon is a bridge... History is a bridge...
TEXT.Chinese: We must get ready to build up the friendship between our peoples. How does a people get prepared for such an endeavour? By strengthening the natural bridges that exist between us. Language is a bridge... Religon is a bridge... History is a bridge...

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. Imagination, devotion, perseverance, together with divine grace, will assure your success. What shall we discuss?
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. Imagination, devotion, perseverance, together with divine grace, will assure your success. What shall we discuss?

TEXT.English: Greetings, [CT_NAME]! It is so great to be at peace with you glorious nation!
TEXT.Chinese: Greetings, [CT_NAME]! It is so great to be at peace with you glorious nation!

TEXT.English: I see you have come to visit, [CT_NAME]. Tell me, what is it you wish to discuss.
TEXT.Chinese: I see you have come to visit, [CT_NAME]. Tell me, what is it you wish to discuss.

TEXT.English: Finally I get to talk to a worthy adversary. What can the [OUR_EMPIRE] do for you?
TEXT.Chinese: Finally I get to talk to a worthy adversary. What can the [OUR_EMPIRE] do for you?

TEXT.English: The world is well supplied with people who wish to rule and dominate others. People like you.
TEXT.Chinese: The world is well supplied with people who wish to rule and dominate others. People like you.

TEXT.English: Oh, you again... What are you going to complain about?
TEXT.Chinese: Oh, you again... What are you going to complain about?

TEXT.English: If one permits an infidel to continue in his role as a corrupter of the earth, the infidel's moral suffering will be all the worse. If one kills the infidel, and this stops him from perpetrating his misdeeds, his death will be a blessing to him.
TEXT.Chinese: If one permits an infidel to continue in his role as a corrupter of the earth, the infidel's moral suffering will be all the worse. If one kills the infidel, and this stops him from perpetrating his misdeeds, his death will be a blessing to him.

TEXT.English: Treachery, cowardice and lies are everywhere - and your nation is no exception.
TEXT.Chinese: Treachery, cowardice and lies are everywhere - and your nation is no exception.

TEXT.English: Speak fast [CT_CIV_ADJ]. I have enough on my schedule already.
TEXT.Chinese: Speak fast [CT_CIV_ADJ]. I have enough on my schedule already.

TEXT.English: You lack the guile to trick me. Be warned I will not react well to deceit.
TEXT.Chinese: You lack the guile to trick me. Be warned I will not react well to deceit.

TEXT.English: The government of the [OUR_EMPIRE] will fulfill its duty to defend its independence, to repel foreign aggression, and accept the struggle to which it has been provoked!
TEXT.Chinese: The government of the [OUR_EMPIRE] will fulfill its duty to defend its independence, to repel foreign aggression, and accept the struggle to which it has been provoked!

TEXT.English: No way! I shall punish you for your crimes against [OUR_CIV_SHORT] and its people!
TEXT.Chinese: No way! I shall punish you for your crimes against [OUR_CIV_SHORT] and its people!

TEXT.English: I knew you would beg for peace eventually, but there will be no peace until you surrender.
TEXT.Chinese: I knew you would beg for peace eventually, but there will be no peace until you surrender.

TEXT.English: Get out of my office!
TEXT.Chinese: Get out of my office!

TEXT.English: You make me sad, [CT_NAME]. Go away.
TEXT.Chinese: You make me sad, [CT_NAME]. Go away.

TEXT.English: I will now use my cunning knowledge of tactics to ignore you.
TEXT.Chinese: I will now use my cunning knowledge of tactics to ignore you.

TEXT.English: Your words are but the grunts of a diseased pig, [CT_NAME]. I do not hear them.
TEXT.Chinese: Your words are but the grunts of a diseased pig, [CT_NAME]. I do not hear them.

TEXT.English: Give me this, [CT_NAME] and perhaps our two nations can live in peace for a while longer.
TEXT.Chinese: Give me this, [CT_NAME] and perhaps our two nations can live in peace for a while longer.

TEXT.English: Hand this over, [CT_NAME], and I might let you continue to exist for a short while longer.
TEXT.Chinese: Hand this over, [CT_NAME], and I might let you continue to exist for a short while longer.

TEXT.English: Unlikely as it may seem, it appears that your puny civilization has something that we want. I suggest you hand it over quickly.
TEXT.Chinese: Unlikely as it may seem, it appears that your puny civilization has something that we want. I suggest you hand it over quickly.

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. And how is that undefended civilization of your coming along?
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. And how is that undefended civilization of your coming along?

TEXT.English: Not a chance. The mighty [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people do not care to make peace with cattle-stealing brigands like you.
TEXT.Chinese: Not a chance. The mighty [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people do not care to make peace with cattle-stealing brigands like you.

TEXT.English: Greetings, [CT_NAME]! The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people always enjoy meeting vulnerable and undefended new civilizations!
TEXT.Chinese: Greetings, [CT_NAME]! The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people always enjoy meeting vulnerable and undefended new civilizations!

TEXT.English: So you have emerged from your fetid country and come to me, [CT_NAME]. To what do I owe this extremely dubious honor?
TEXT.Chinese: So you have emerged from your fetid country and come to me, [CT_NAME]. To what do I owe this extremely dubious honor?

TEXT.English: We require mighty [CT_CIV_SHORT]'s assistance. I hope you won't disappoint us.
TEXT.Chinese: We require mighty [CT_CIV_SHORT]'s assistance. I hope you won't disappoint us.

TEXT.English: A Mutual Protection Pact - Each Party Agrees to Automatically Declare War if the Other Party is Attacked.
TEXT.Chinese: A Mutual Protection Pact - Each Party Agrees to Automatically Declare War if the Other Party is Attacked.

TEXT.English: Slave Trade
TEXT.Chinese: Slave Trade

TEXT.English: Good day and bonjour, to you [CT_NAME]. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people wish for peace, but insist that masters in our own house we must be.
TEXT.Chinese: Good day and bonjour, to you [CT_NAME]. The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people wish for peace, but insist that masters in our own house we must be.

TEXT.English: Finally we meet [CT_NAME], I have been awaiting your arrival. I am Meiji of Japan. Come, we have much to discuss. You have very nice dress, and I am impressed by your armies. Please, show me your ways and I shall show you the wonders of Japan...
TEXT.Chinese: Finally we meet [CT_NAME], I have been awaiting your arrival. I am Meiji of Japan. Come, we have much to discuss. You have very nice dress, and I am impressed by your armies. Please, show me your ways and I shall show you the wonders of Japan...

TEXT.English: Welcome to the independent [OUR_CIV_ADJ] lands! I am the king [OUR_NAME], will [CT_CIV_SHORT] recognize [OUR_CIV_SHORT]'s independence or do I need to convince you with my armies?
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome to the independent [OUR_CIV_ADJ] lands! I am the king [OUR_NAME], will [CT_CIV_SHORT] recognize [OUR_CIV_SHORT]'s independence or do I need to convince you with my armies?

TEXT.English: Here comes my best friend, [CT_NAME]! What brings you today to [OUR_CIV_SHORT]?
TEXT.Chinese: Here comes my best friend, [CT_NAME]! What brings you today to [OUR_CIV_SHORT]?

TEXT.English: You are an enemy of [OUR_CIV_SHORT], but I will talk to you.
TEXT.Chinese: You are an enemy of [OUR_CIV_SHORT], but I will talk to you.

TEXT.English: We desperatedly demand your assistance, [CT_NAME]! [OUR_CIV_SHORT]'s future depends on you!
TEXT.Chinese: We desperatedly demand your assistance, [CT_NAME]! [OUR_CIV_SHORT]'s future depends on you!

TEXT.English: Any chance you share your wealth with [OUR_CIV_SHORT]?
TEXT.Chinese: Any chance you share your wealth with [OUR_CIV_SHORT]?

TEXT.English: Recognizing me as king of the [OUR_EMPIRE] is not enough! I demand the following in tribute!
TEXT.Chinese: Recognizing me as king of the [OUR_EMPIRE] is not enough! I demand the following in tribute!
